name: Incident Survival
storyline: At least one player is appointed as the game master (the host). You will have a fictional incident available - a situation that will place you and your characters in an unusual and challenging situation from which they need to find a way out, or just survive as long as possible. The main help is a shelter, a temporary place with limited amenities and living spaces.
summary: Role-playing board game. Your fate is in your own hands. Join together with others who want to test their abilities in a challenging situation and use the right arguments to convince others of your worth.
